pageContent: Objectives: To estimate the impact of peri-prostatic fat (PPF) measurements using preoperative magnetic resonance imaging on the prediction of prostate cancer (PCa) with transrectal ultrasound-guided biopsy.

metaData.source:
Comparison of transrectal prostate biopsy results with histology of transurethral resection of the prostate in men undergoing high-intensity focused ultrasound
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23406907/
